snippet.title: Pretend it's not There - Indie Horror Game - No Commentary
snippet.description:
Thanks For Watching!

Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Stella-Abbasi-100150965166877/
Twitter https://twitter.com/StellaAbbasi

Download https://dreadloom-studios.itch.io/pretend-its-not-there

You are a young student returning home from school, burdened by an unsettling presence of something following you. You convince yourself that if you ignore it, it will leave you alone. But as you close your front door, a horrible realization sets in—it followed you inside.

Left alone with the monster in the house, you must carry out your nightly routine, pretending not to notice it's presence. 

Indie Horror Game Playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLk0tZ0YT3FZEsIgd3Qdj19xGe9VcMMI1P

#pretenditsnotthere #Indiegames
